techmeme.title: As the EU's MiCA crypto regulation takes effect on June 30, the industry remains uncertain about the ramifications; some stablecoin rules arrive in late 2024 (James Hunt/The Block)
Q&A with Tim Cook on how AI will help users "save time", sticking to Apple's values, the Apple Intelligence name, hallucinations, OpenAI, journalism, and more (Josh Tyrangiel/Washington Post)
Apple's AI features are quintessentially Apple and probably take the right approach, but many won't launch until 2025; new Siri is missing from the iOS 18 beta (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Sources: Spotify plans to launch a higher-priced premium monthly plan later in 2024, charging $5+ more for better audio, playlist and library tools, and more (Bloomberg)
Paris-based AI startup Mistral raised €600M led by General Catalyst, sources say comprising €468M in equity and €132M in debt at a €5.8B valuation (Financial Times)
